resources.string: Welcome to RNJESUS – Let divine randomness decide! 🎲
\n\nWhether you\'re flipping a coin, rolling dice, drawing straws, or picking a card, trust in the higher power of chance.

• Coin Flip – Heads or tails? Leave it to fate.

• Roll Dice – From D6 to D20, let your roll be guided by a higher power.

• Draw Straws – Who’s going first? Settle it fair and square with righteous intervention.

• Pick a Card– Need a card? Shuffle the deck and RNJESUS decide.
No need to argue, overthink, or fight your friends—let RNJESUS take the wheel (and maybe the dice too).
🃏 How to Use the Card Picker:\n \n
• Let\'s Get Started – Tap “Draw Card” to reveal one random card from the deck.\n \n
• One and Done – The card you draw is removed from the deck.\n \n
• Need a Restart? – Tap the reshuffle icon to mix the full deck and go again!\n \n
• Why So Serious? – Tap the slider to input jokers in the deck or keep it classic it\'s your call!\n \n
No deck of cards nearby? RNJESUS has your back.\n
